Consumer Direct Care Network Sponsored Join Consumer Direct Care Network and build genuine and authentic connections by providing non-medical, in-home care to your clients, either for one day or for a lifetime! Duties may include: - Companionship and conversation - Light housekeeping tasks and meal preparation - Medication assistance or reminders - Assistance with grooming and bathing - Transport Clients to/from medical appointments - Monitor and report changes in health, behavior, and needs Make a difference in someone's life, one visit at a time. Contact us today and start sharing your heart!
